document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of squat lobsters of the world (Crustacea: Decapoda: Anomura-families Chirostylidae, Galatheidae and Kiwaidae)

Munida incerta

Baba , 1994a: 12
(off Central Queensland , 497–503 m (= different species, Macpherson & Baba (unpublished)).

Agononida incerta . —
Ahyong & Poore, 2004b: 8
(part) ( New South Wales ; 270–641 m ) (= different species, Macpherson & Baba (unpublished)).

subSubSection.paragraph: Note. Baba (1994, 2005), Macpherson (1994) , Ahyong & Poore (2004) , among others, have pointed out the existence of at least two different species confirmed by molecular analyses (Lin, unpublished data). The differences between these species are under study.
